alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 9:28AM CDT until April 03 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Crenshaw County in south central Alabama... East central Conecuh County in south central Alabama... Northern Covington County in south central Alabama... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 928 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Dozier to near Red Level to 11 miles south of McKenzie to I65 And US 84, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Andalusia, Opp, River Falls, Red Level, Dozier, Heath and Gantt. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Alabama.
